title: Resize and center the header logo image

requirements.summary: Make the header logo image slightly smaller and visually centered by adjusting only the logo Tailwind classes in SiteHeader.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx`, the logo `` height is reduced from its current size (currently `h-12`) to a smaller size.
The logo `` is horizontally centered using only ``-level styling (e.g., `block` + `mx-auto` or equivalent), without changing the surrounding header structure.
No other header elements (nav, buttons, containers, or the `<a>` wrapper) are modified.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the logo `` element at the specified XPath by adjusting its Tailwind `className`: reduce height from `h-12` to a smaller value (e.g., `h-10`) and add ``-level centering classes (e.g., `block` and `mx-auto`, or equivalent) without changing the surrounding `` or any other header/layout elements.
